definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
one's thoughts/mind/intention/willingness to accept new ideas/baseless suspicions
magnanimous/considerate/thoughtful/able to think of everything that needs to be thought of
from the bottom of one's heart/heartily/sincerely
to be on the alert/to keep one's eyes open
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]

sentences.english: Though he looks surly , he has his heart in the right place.
sentences.chinese: 他表面上雖然顯得粗暴，可是心眼兒卻不錯。

sentences.english: How could she be so narrow-minded I'll do something for you.
sentences.chinese: 她怎麼能這麼小心眼兒？我會幫你的。

sentences.english: They camped in the open and devoted themselves single-mindedly to the drilling of oil wells.
sentences.chinese: 他們住在帳篷裏，一個心眼地打油井。
她怎麼能這麼小心眼兒？我會幫你的。

sentences.english: Stay especially alters when traveling alone.
sentences.chinese: 獨自旅行更得長個心眼。

sentences.english: No, she the cultural level, would not be narrow-minded.
sentences.chinese: 不會，她那個文化水平，就不會是小心眼。

sentences.english: She had a visceral dislike of all things foreign.
sentences.chinese: 凡是外國的東西，她都打心眼兒裏討厭。

sentences.english: Don't is nasty to your little brother.
sentences.chinese: 別跟你小弟弟動壞心眼兒。

sentences.english: You do not want to give the impressionthat you are playing favorites.
sentences.chinese: 你不願給他人留下偏心眼的印象。

sentences.english: Yes, too long and intense an acquaintance can lead to sourness .
sentences.chinese: 的確，如此過久而認真的相知可導致壞心眼。

sentences.english: Disordered nerves and bad digestion are a common cause of backbiting .
sentences.chinese: 緊張不安加上壞心眼一般是背後議人是非的原因。

sentences.english: It warms the cockles of the heart to see the children so happy.
sentences.chinese: 看到孩子們這麼幸福，大家從心眼兒裏感到高興。

sentences.english: If you think I am an apple-headed women, you are wrong.
sentences.chinese: 如果你以爲我是個缺心眼的女人，那你就錯了。

sentences.english: The mountains and rivers, hometown of heart, also like Wang de lou.
sentences.chinese: 故國山川，故園心眼，還似王粲登樓。

sentences.english: In the family, the parents will be also prejudicial to the attractive child.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭裏，父母也會對漂亮的孩子偏心眼。

sentences.english: It's nasty of you to say so.

definition: one's thoughts/mind/intention/willingness to accept new ideas/baseless suspicions
clever-clever/clever in trivial matters/sharp but petty-minded
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
